import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-eventos', templateUrl: './eventos.component.html', styleUrls: ['./eventos.component.scss'] }) export class EventosComponent implements OnInit { public eventos: any = []; larguraimg: number = 150; margenimg: number = 2; mostrarimg: boolean = true; private _filtroLista: string = ''; public get filtroLista() { return this._filtroLista; } isCollapsed = true; constructor(private http: HttpClient) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.getEventos(); } alterarImg() { this.mostrarimg = !this.mostrarimg; } public getEventos(): void { this.http.get('https://localhost:5001/api/eventos').subscribe( response => this.eventos = response, error => console.log(error) ); } }
